pr_title: Addresses sonar warnings of recent code changes

timeline.message: Addresses sonar warnings of recent code changes

timeline.bodyText: NB. because of serialisation the type here must be a type known to be Serializable
timeline.author: jbee

timeline.bodyText: NB. This is so sonar will no more complain about the _ in the name which makes those hidden parameters.
timeline.author: jbee

timeline.bodyText: NB. This stops sonar from complaining about non private fields that are not final which is needed for JSON IO.
timeline.author: jbee
